en.login_subtitle: Log in to manage your football journey
en.join_network: Join the global football talent network
en.parent_consent: I confirm that I have parental/guardian consent
en.agree_terms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
en.verify_email_desc: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
en.parent_consent_text: I confirm that I have parental/guardian consent (required for players under 18)
en.agree_to_the: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
en.footer_desc: The global platform where players showcase skills, clubs find talent, and scouts discover the next generation.
en.featured_players_desc: Discover the next generation of football stars
en.rankings_preview_desc: Rankings based on verified match data, performance analytics, and scouting insights.
en.stories_highlights_desc: Watch the latest player performances and training sessions
en.how_it_works_desc: From creating your profile to growing your sports career, weâ€™ve made every step simple and effective.
en.step_1_desc: Sign up in minutes and build your comprehensive player profile. Add your personal info, position, stats, and achievements. Parents can create and manage profiles for minors with full control.
en.step_2_desc: Share your best game footage, training videos, and skill highlights. Our AI-powered evaluation system analyzes your performance and generates your PlayerScore based on technical skills, physical attributes, and game intelligence.
en.step_3_desc: Verified clubs, academies, and professional scouts browse our rankings and discover talent. Get direct contact from opportunities worldwide. Track your progress and watch your career take off.
en.trusted_clubs_desc: Professional football organizations trust FootballTalento to identify and evaluate emerging talent.
en.join_500_clubs: Join 500+ clubs and academies discovering talent on FootballTalento
en.safety_trust_desc: Built to protect young athletes while helping them grow in a secure and verified environment.
en.commitment_desc: FootballTalento is designed with the safety and well-being of young players at its core. We align with international child protection standards, work with safeguarding organizations, and enforce a zero-tolerance policy for inappropriate behavior.
en.parent_controlled_desc: Parents retain full control over minor profiles, including visibility settings, connection approvals, and activity monitoring.
en.verified_identities_desc: All users undergo identity verification. Clubs and scouts complete KYC checks to ensure accountability and trust.
en.anti_fake_desc: AI systems detect fake profiles, manipulated media, and fraudulent activity to maintain platform integrity.
en.gdpr_desc: Fully GDPR-compliant with enhanced protections for minors, including consent management and right-to-erasure controls.
en.success_stories_desc: Real journeys from players, parents, and football professionals using FootballTalento.
en.hero_desc_1: A global platform where players showcase skills and get discovered by clubs and scouts worldwide.
en.hero_desc_2: Clubs and academies access verified player profiles, rankings, and performance insights.
en.hero_desc_3: Professional scouts discover talent faster with real performance data and video analysis.
en.manage_profile_desc: Manage your FootballTalento profile and activities
en.forgot_password_subtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions
en.reset_sent_text: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email
en.security_tip_desc: Never share your password reset link with anyone.
en.forgot_password_info: We'll send you a reset link to your registered email address.
en.reset_password_subtitle: Your new password must be different from previous passwords
en.success_reset_desc: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now use your new password to sign in.
en.security_reminder_desc: Keep your password secure and don't share it with anyone.
